section.heading: Definitions.
section.text: For the purposes of this chapter, the term:

para.text: “Legal custody” includes imprisonment, jail, or detention.
“Ward” means any person in the official custody of the District government, on a temporary or permanent basis, because of neglect, abuse, mental illness or intellectual disability.

annotations.annotation: The 2012 amendment by D.C. Law 19-169 substituted “intellectual disability” for “mental retardation” in (3).

For temporary (90 day) addition of applicability provision, see § 2920 of the Fiscal Year 2001 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2000 (D.C. Act 13-438, October 20, 2000, 47 DCR 8740).
